org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web

Class SamlValidateController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.web.AbstractDelegateController
      • org.jasig.cas.web.AbstractServiceValidateController
        • org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web.SamlValidateController

  • @Component(value="samlValidateController")
 @Controller
public class SamlValidateController
extends AbstractServiceValidateController
    The SamlValidateController is responsible for validating requests based on the saml1 protocol.
    Since:
    4.2
